power.title: Dazzling Flare
power.fluff: Painfully bright light flashes from your holy symbol

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: One-half the penalty to attack rolls.

power.title: Divine Rush
power.fluff: You drive your foe back with a mighty attack and follow it to prevent its escape

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
For each square you push the target, you must shift to the closest space adjacent to the target.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target half the distance.
For each square you push the target, you must shift to the closest space adjacent to the target.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This power can be used in place of a melee basic attack on a charge.

power.title: Dread Smite
power.fluff: The dark coldness at the heart of each vice makes your strike all the more crippling

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You target an enemy with an at-will Weapon attack power

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering enemy immediately takes cold and necrotic damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier.
If the triggering attack normally deals radiant damage, it instead deals cold and necrotic damage, and the Radiant keyword is replaced with the Cold and Necrotic keywords.
If the triggering attack hits, the target is also weakened (save ends).

section.name: Special:
section.text: Dread smite can be chosen at all levels where you gain an encounter attack, allowing you to use it more than once per encounter. You cannot use more than one dread smite on a given attack, and you should keep track separately of different levels of the power that deal increased damage.

power.title: Fearsome Smite
power.fluff: When you strike a foe with your weapon, the fierce blow causes it to shudder and second-guess its tactics

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Wisdom modifier on the first attack the target makes, and 1 + one-half your Wisdom modifier on any other attacks it makes.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and one-half the penalty.

power.title: Guardian Light
power.fluff: As you attack, a faint glow emanates from your weapon to envelope you and bolster your defenses for a time

section.name: Special:
section.text: You make this attack as either a melee Weapon attack, or a ranged Implement attack.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC (weapon), or
Charisma vs. Will (implement)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage as a Weapon attack, or 1d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage as an Implement attack.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to Fortitude, Reflex and Will equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Heedless Fury
power.fluff: You lay into your foe without regard for your own safety

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take a -5 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Holy Smite
power.fluff: Your weapon fills with divine radiant energy, which burst forth as you strike your enemy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You target an enemy with an at-will Weapon attack.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering enemy immediately takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier.
If the triggering attack hits, the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: holy smite can be chosen at all levels where you gain an encounter attack, allowing you to use it more than once per encounter. You cannot use more than one holy smite on a given attack, and you should keep track separately of different levels of the power that deal increased damage.

power.title: Piercing Smite
power.fluff: Silvery spikes cover your weapon, punching through your foe's armor

section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You subject the target to your Divine Sanction until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Radiant Smite
power.fluff: Your weapon glows with a pearly luminescence, causing your enemies to shrink from its pure light

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, enemies must spend an additional square of movement for each square they willingly move closer to you.

power.title: Shielding Smite
power.fluff: A translucent golden shield forms in front of a nearby ally as you attack with your weapon

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.
Choose one ally within 5 squares of you. The chosen ally gains a power bonus to AC and Reflex equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Choose one ally within 5 squares of you. The chosen ally gains a power bonus to AC and Reflex equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Stolen Life
power.fluff: You slam your weapon home, channeling your foe's pain into healing

section.name: Attack:

section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
